name: HomeBrew+ v0.9.8.1
description:
[img]https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/149528075355422721/300777522004623362/logo-hb.jpg[/img]

Crafting Stations added:
-Brewery.
-Beehive.
-Mortar.
-Smoker.
-Ostrich Corral.
-Fog Catcher.
-Antelope Corral.
-Hops Garden.
-Aloe Garden.
-Yellow Lotus Garden.
-Stove
-Rabbit Hutch
-Corn Garden
-Spider Corral
-Jumble Market Buy ans Sell
-Aquilonian Luna Coin
-Croc Corral.
-Trall Stand.
-True Indigo Garden
-False Mandrake Garden
-Grey-flower Lupine Garden.
-Cactus Garden.
-Aquatic Plants Garden
-Fern Garden.
-Windmill.
-Grey Rhino Corral.

...and a lot of items and recipes.


Added bees as random drop when picking plants.
Added hops as random drop when picking aloe, lotus and others.
Added seeds as random drop when picking aloe, lotus and others.
Added fertilized ostrich eggs as random drop when kill a ostrich.
Build some Fog Catcher to get water (Only need to put ONE stone in the Fog Cacher to start working).
Brew your own Liqueurs.
Grow your own plants.


TO DO:
-Rebalance the amount of food, drink and effect of each item according to the difficulty of crafting. More difficulty, better values. Now, I don't know exactly how disbalanced is . I'll need paper and pen.


*This mod modifies the items, feats and recipes tables.. i don't know how it works with other mods that modify the same tables.
**WARNING: For your safety and my peace, make a backup of your saved game before trying my mod.
***My English is from google translate, sorry...
**** If something goes wrong, I'll try to fix it, but remember I'm new at this.


[img]https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/149528075355422721/300775311518466048/logo-dark1.jpg[/img]

steam://connect/158.69.122.240:27065

60 Slots

PVE (Maybe RP later).
EXP 5x
If we have to change some rate more, will do later.
A friend will help me with the administration.

Mods(in this order):
Homebrew+
City for Homebrew+
Unlock Plus

*Do not do construction in the city (for now).

Mod ID: 873905655
changeNote:
-Added Windmill Thrall (Cook).
-Now WindMill accept Glowing Algae Seeds.
-Spider Corral now also give ichor.
-Gazelle Corral is now Antelope Corral. (Changed Recipe, now need Antelope Head).
-Slight modifications in Hops Garden model, True indigo Garden model., Corn Garden model.
